Cause of Disease: Excess lush pasture, high grain intake, rumen gas buildup
Precautions: Avoid sudden introduction to lush pasture and regulate grain feeding.
Care: Keep the animal calm and provide supportive care until gas release occurs.
Home Remedies: Provide vegetable oil drench and allow neem stick chewing.
Treatment/Medicine: Administer antifoaming agents and perform trocarization or rumenotomy if necessary.
